org.sensorhub.api.persistence

Class DataFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sensorhub.api.persistence.DataFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDataFilter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ObsFilter

    public class DataFilter
extends Object
implements IDataFilter

    Default implementation of IDataFilter returning null on all filter predicates. It is meant be used as a base to implement your own filter and unlike IDataFilter doesn't require implementing all methods.

    Since:
    May 9, 2015
    Author:
    Alex Robin

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DataFilter(String recordType) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection<String> getProducerIDs()
      Gets filter criteria for selecting data records associated to certain producers.
      Only data records associated to one of the listed producer IDs will be selected.
      If the list is null or empty, no filtering on producer ID will be applied.
      String getRecordType() 
      double[] getTimeStampRange()
      Gets filter criteria for selecting data records based on time stamp.
      Only records whose time stamp (usually sampling time for sensors) lies within that range will be selected (range is inclusive).
      If range is null, no filtering on time stamp will be applied.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        Returns:
        the record type that needs to be retrieved (cannot be null)

      • getTimeStampRange

        public double[] getTimeStampRange()
        Description copied from interface: IDataFilter
        Gets filter criteria for selecting data records based on time stamp.
        Only records whose time stamp (usually sampling time for sensors) lies within that range will be selected (range is inclusive).
        If range is null, no filtering on time stamp will be applied.
        Specified by:
        getTimeStampRange in interface IDataFilter
        Returns:
        Desired time stamp range

      • getProducerIDs

        public Collection<String> getProducerIDs()
        Description copied from interface: IDataFilter
        Gets filter criteria for selecting data records associated to certain producers.
        Only data records associated to one of the listed producer IDs will be selected.
        If the list is null or empty, no filtering on producer ID will be applied.
        Specified by:
        getProducerIDs in interface IDataFilter
        Returns:
        List of desired producer IDs
